job.title: Frontend Software Engineer
job.description: Fifth Season is a highgrowth venturebacked startup using robots IoT and data analytics to transform the indoor vertical farming industry Our implementation combines a fleet of physical robots and IoTenabled devices to provide a complete cloudmanaged farmbrbrWe produce significant yields compared to traditional farms while using up to 95 less water avoiding topsoil degradation and reducing runoff pollution Our smart indoor farms deliver perfect pure produce no matter the season or location Leafy greens are just the beginning as we move forward in revolutionizing farm to platebrbrstrongWere seeking a Frontend Engineer with experience in React to help lead the development of the internal information system software that our company uses to manage and analyze our growing processstrong This will include everything from the UI used by daytoday farm operators to the management of and data analysis from a fleet of IoT sensors to the control and settings for robots and mechatronics systems about the farmbrbrYoull work directly with our founding team and our tightknit crossfunctional engineering team to apply industry knowledge in an emerging space and make an impact on the worldbrbrstrongWhat youll work on brstrongulliCreating the user interface for our internal farm applicationliliCreating mobiledevice based user applications liliDeploying intuitive visualization of data to drive actionable insights liliFacilitate workflows and UX considerations spanning novice to expertlevel usersliliIntegrating with 3rd party reporting and visualization tools liliReducing the effort of lifts by integrating with third party tools and providers libraries cloud servicesbrbrliulstrongWhat were looking forbrstrongulliAt least 3 years experience in frontend software development preferably in cloudbased products or roboticsliliExperience with JavaScript Reactjs JSX FluxRedux NodejsliliExperience with REST API fundamentals request handling data modeling liliHandson experience working with various database and data pipeline technologiesliliUnderstanding of code versioning tools Git issue tracking tools and process and peer reviewliliExperience and a passion for writing modular reusable code that is well tested liliBA or higher in Computer Science Computer Engineering or similar degreebrbrliulstrongNice to have but not required brstrongulliSome experience with Grafana Dashboard and TableauliliExperience with continuous integration and deploymentbrbrliulstrongWho We ArestrongbrbrFifth Season has developed a oneofkind technology solution for autonomous indoor vertical farming by combining a fleet of robotics with IoTenabled devices for a complete cloudmanaged integrated farm system These hyperlocal smart farms allow for healthy delicious chemicalfree produce to be delivered without wasteful longdistance distribution And our patented recipes allow our produce to have weeks  not days  of shelf lifebrbrHealthy food has become convenient but were here to make it truly fresh  both nationally via grocery retailers and locally via directtoconsumer ecommerce Were bringing joy and delight to consumers that are ready for a food revolution with a new category of fresh foodbrbrstrongIf you share our mission of making a positive impact on consumers and the planet we want to hear from you brbrstrongPowered by JazzHRbrbr6VwpmIiWXe
